The user was then presented with two options regarding the shade of red desired for the background color, as well as whether they wanted additional elements or textures. The AI also provided a checklist of additional features, noting which were selected, including a dynamic tagline under the header and a sticky header that remains visible while scrolling. The user expressed the desire to make the header more catchy, to which the AI responded that it would work on that as well. Furthermore, the AI asked the user for a more detailed description of the project.
